title: Moss Mother
lore: The Moss Mother is rooted deep in Pharloom’s grotto. Her vines embody the land’s resilience, blocking Hornet’s ascent until she proves her strength.

title: Feral Sentinel
lore: A relentless hunter, the Feral Sentinel stalks the lower paths. Its primal fury reflects the dangers of Pharloom’s wilds.

title: Bell Beast
lore: The tolling roar of the Bell Beast shakes the ascent. Its presence is a reminder of Pharloom’s ancient guardianship.

title: Marrow Judge
lore: An arbiter of Pharloom’s castes, the Marrow Judge enforces order with bone‑deep authority.

title: Lace (First Encounter)
lore: Hornet’s rival appears for the first time, testing her resolve and foreshadowing their deeper conflict.

title: Silken Consul
lore: The Silken Consul embodies Pharloom’s hierarchy, weaving threads of control through the Citadel.

title: Glass Judge
lore: Cold and precise, the Glass Judge enforces Citadel law with crystalline clarity.

title: Choir Sentinel
lore: Guardian of the Citadel’s song, the Choir Sentinel resonates with power and tradition.

title: Lace (Second Encounter)
lore: Hornet’s rival returns, their duel escalating into a clash of destiny.

title: Crust King
lore: Armored in hardened shell, the Crust King is a late‑game guardian whose endurance tests Hornet’s limits.

title: Nyleth & Guardian
lore: A dual encounter tied to Pharloom’s deepest lore, Nyleth and her Guardian embody the land’s mysteries.

title: Karmelita the Dancer
lore: The climactic fight, Karmelita’s dance is both beautiful and deadly — Hornet’s final trial before the ending.
